page.title: 08Out of School Activities
page.content: At{Threemilestone}Church they have{ {Cubs,Brownies and Girl Guides}which are held there. At the{Community {Centre}they have Judo and other activities. The Brownies is on from 5.00 p.m to 6.00 p.m. They go for walks and play games. Girl Guides starts at 7.30 p.m and ends at 9.00 they also go for walks and follow tracks. They also play games like the Brownies. Judo is held at the Community Centre. Every Saturday at 10.00 a.m the younger ones are the first group and they end at 11.00 a.m then the older ones go in until 12.00 p.m. The man that teaches them is calles "Mr Dowding" but on the mat they call him "Sense" and they learn how to fall without hurting themselves and how to throw other people as a kind of protection but they are not allowed to do it off the mat.
